casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. JOHN E. VITALE, JR. SULLIVAN, C. J., and KATZ, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition. Michael A. D’Onofrio, special public defender, in support of the petition. Michele C. Lukban, assistant state’s attorney, in opposition. Decided June 4, 2003

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
